website_summaries.verdict: Works great for turning tough cuts of meat into tender meals.
pros: Has a protective cover when storing this popular device
cons: Too small for tenderizing large pieces of meat
Some customers say cleaning the tenderizer is difficult

customer_reviews.title: but cleaning is not easy. I have only used this on beef
customer_reviews.text: It works, but cleaning is not easy. I have only used this on beef. The description and instructions say do not submerge in water, but you really can't even run the black top portion under water real quick to wash, as water still gets into that section. I needed to because my hands weren't clean and rinsing/cleaning raw beef off the top was necessary. Also when you put the clear plastic protective lid back on the air tight pressure causes water to exit the rim of the where you push down.
customer_reviews.author: cakeNbacon

customer_reviews.title: Good but uncomfortable to use.
customer_reviews.text: It works and it is nice looking. The safety lock is a plus. But it requires alot of strength to use and it will hurt your wrists after a few steaks. I cook for three people and this hurt my wrist alot. Not recommended for people who cooks for a bigger family.
customer_reviews.author: Chris N

customer_reviews.title: Helps on grocery costs!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on almost every type of meat that I cook. I have saved money at the grocery store because now I can purchase cheaper cuts of meat without having my family complain about tough cuts. It also helps my let go of some aggression that I may be holding in. ;)
customer_reviews.author: LynneaL

customer_reviews.title: Its a pain to wash
customer_reviews.text: So i try not to wash it in the dish washer so it'll last longer, but that seems to be the easiest way to clean it for now. I tried soaking it in hot water too but it doesnt work as well as I was hoping for. Other than that, its a good meat tenderizer and my husband loves it.
customer_reviews.author: YL

customer_reviews.title: Tender is the word that I use to describe! I now make steak like a pro.
customer_reviews.text: Works so well! I use this on both sides of the steak. I add a little tenderizer and spices, then sear it on both sides then Cook it the rest of the way with a lid. Wallah! I have tender steak like the pro's make! I've even used this technique on pork and it with the right seasoning, it tastes like steak!
customer_reviews.author: SCOVB

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tenderizing Meat
customer_reviews.text: I rarely use this but i do like it. If you have a tough cut of meat, use this gizmo. Some say to then soak the "needled" meat in milk for a couple of hours (or even overnight) to further tenderize and make the meat juicier.
customer_reviews.author: mzzbee

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for anyone that grills or cooks steaks. It really tenderizes steaks. If you add a rub to a steak prior to using this tool it will push the rub into the steak and makes it taste great. I have yet to try it on other meats.
customer_reviews.author: MarioD

customer_reviews.title: the needle cut my finger, while I figure out ...
customer_reviews.text: the needle cut my finger, while I figure out how to use it, because it didn't come with a direction.
customer_reviews.author: bendy

customer_reviews.title: better then a mallet
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. When use it to tenderize our clams we get. If you have ever tenderized clams you know that it is not all that easy this is much easier then using those meat mallets no swings and worry about food going everywhere. Very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Rough handling by UPS caused the tenderizer to arrive damaged. I contacted the seller who quickly replaced it. This product works very well & really tenderized some flank steak which isn't the most tender cut of beef. This is a must have for my kitchen and the customer support is great.
customer_reviews.author: RAC

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen investment
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purpose of this kitchen tool. I was so impressed with its ease of use and ability produce such an amazing impact on tenderizing meat, that I bought one for my sister. They love it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: CynBur

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. Easy to use and gets the job done quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kermit Buchman Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a safety lock
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price! It even came with a cleaning brush and it has a safety lock.
customer_reviews.author: dennis cavaltera`

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, works great !
customer_reviews.text: This meat tenderizer works great and turned a tough steak into a wonderful easy to eat steak that saved our family money by buying a less expensive steak & making it tender.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Care in cleaning and ALWAYS clean after each use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good tool for any kitchen. Care is needed when cleaning this tool because of sharp tines.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as described!
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. It can demolish a steak, but it makes it tender!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi H.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to tenderize meats. It’s a bit hard to clean in between the needles but works well
customer_reviews.author: Yue Q

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: It was a little hard to hold on to and press. Not as easy to clean as I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Allwynne M Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Not great product but great seller...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't cut through pork belly skin without a lot of force and effort. The whole point of my purchase so kinda disappointed. Update: The seller has made several attempts to contact me to make amends. I changed my review to 4 stars because they are honest sellers and I would purchase from them again even though the product didn't work as intended.
customer_reviews.author: KPO

customer_reviews.title: Best meat tenderizer with no effort!
customer_reviews.text: Had always used meat hammer. Bought this and now wonder why it took me 40-yrs of pounding vs this handy gadget? Keep fingers out of way, these teeth are Really Sharp!
customer_reviews.author: rellimeagle

customer_reviews.title: No more fork mark on your steaks
customer_reviews.text: Works like a dream. No more forking of meat! It cleans with a quick blast of hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Kekaha Caregiver

customer_reviews.title: Effective.
customer_reviews.text: It works as it should. And that’s all I can tell you.
customer_reviews.author: Otto Bhan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product if you want a tender steak you will need and want this. Only same that I can say is the blades are extremely Sharp. Just be careful
customer_reviews.author: Jim & Gena

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this tenderizer. It is easy to use and clean. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: cindy w.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I think we have purchase about 7 of these mostly gifts to our friends after we feed them a tender steak. Wife loves it
customer_reviews.author: LeRoy Campeau

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: Complete bummer! Arrived broken (plastic casing shattered). Honestly, not worth going through the trouble of returning,
customer_reviews.author: addison

customer_reviews.title: meat tenderizer
customer_reviews.text: nice meat (all kinds) tenderizer and for marinating, easy to use but does take some force to puncture, pretty easy to clean too
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rotman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, exactly what I was looking for. Superior quality. Received it sooner that expect.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: You won't be disappointed. The blades are sharp and easy to use. Put in dishwasher to clean. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Collins

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a couple of months. Now the blades are falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Tuna61

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: After years of tough, dry chicken - this a great solution. This tool is remarkable in it's ability to break down the muscle/fiber in cuts of meat/chicken and allow marinades and spices to penetrate. I wish I had found this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Beach Bum

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL, VERY SHARP!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works perfect. Best tenderizer I have ever used. We like the flavor of Sirloins, this product turns them into Fillets!! I don't usually post reviews, but had to with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marty B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I sliced open my finger the first time I touched this thing. I guess that means it's sharp enough
customer_reviews.author: C. Ledin-Bristol

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I have used this numerous times over the last 2 months and it tenderizes even the cheapest meat
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. It's worked on really tough meat ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. It's worked on really tough meat, really big roasts, just worried about the plastic safety guard breaking (hasn't done so yet and I've really push it to the Limit)
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bratcher

customer_reviews.title: It makes many tiny holes; however,not certin how much more tender meat became?
customer_reviews.text: It's kinda a fun toy that conveys marginal benefits to final presentation. It's likely that the tougher the starting meat, the more it is worth.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Young

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I've only used t once and it did not work well. The needles stuck to the steak (no bones) and had to be pried off each time. It did make the steak more tender (which I need to do for my hubby) but was a real pain to use because it was not easy to pry it off. At age 77, I like things that are easy, not that are more work. I will try another kind but will probably go back to having the butcher run the steaks through the "tenderizer" at the supermarket. Or maybe I will try spraying the needles with Pam first and give it another shot before I pitch it.
customer_reviews.author: J. K.

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great. It really does soften an otherwise tough piece ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. It really does soften an otherwise tough piece of meat. Haven't taken it apart yet, but supposedly that can be done.
customer_reviews.author: Roy S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this meat tenderizer! It is so quick and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm redoing my review, and giving it 5 stars. We had a bit of a hard time twisting it from the safety lock position and I thought I was going to have to return it. I told my daughter it was stuck, so she grabbed some silicone mitt's and was able to give the tenderizer the twist it needed to unlock it. Now after a few twists back and forth with just my hands, it works like a charm. Just did some chicken breast, can't wait to do a steak or roast.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolee'

customer_reviews.title: Hand cramps using this, it has an awkward grip ...
customer_reviews.text: Hand cramps using this, it has an awkward grip. Very hard to clean to spikes and ended up stabbing my finger trying to push the spikes through and scrub them. It functions, does its job so... I guess it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use this to tenderize chicken. It’s great. So happy not to have to use a mallet any longer. No splattered chicken juices. 🤢 The blades tenderize they chicken perfectly. Easy to clean as well. Soak in warm soapy water directly after use. I really like that it has a locking feature and also that it has a cover that snaps on
customer_reviews.author: Meek

customer_reviews.title: This kitchen tool has been amazing. You can take a healthy but tough piece ...
customer_reviews.text: I have known about these tenderizers from years of watching cooking shows. Why did I wait so long to buy one?!?! This kitchen tool has been amazing. You can take a healthy but tough piece of sirloin and make it filet tender using this. I worked both sides of some New York Strips last night and cooked to med/rare, I could cut them with a fork. And an added benefit? All your seasonings and marinades make it "into" the meat. Fantastic tool to add to the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Ray V.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have bought one of these for all my family. It does excellent tenderizing meat. I can cut my chicken with a fork. However, it should be easier to clean. I would like to have the unit lock in the upward position so all the tenderizing spikes are exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Musiclady

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Dishwasher safe. Good tension on the spring. Will thin the meat some. It looks like it should last five years or so. I will use regularly since my better half has some difficulty processing some meats. Just used it for the first time on skinless boneless turkey breast that was still a little frozen. No prob
customer_reviews.author: PeterK

customer_reviews.title: Use on cuts under 1"
customer_reviews.text: Silly me I had been hoping this would work better on cheap roasts but it really doesnt have enough blade length. I suspect it would be handy on steaks specially such as round steak. Its hard to clean but that comes with the territory
customer_reviews.author: alden

customer_reviews.title: Well made and tough
customer_reviews.text: Everything great about the tenderizer, except the cleaning. Nothing you can do about it; you use it once and into the dishwasher where it sits until a load is ready. I would not trust hand cleaning. So I guess ya need two. :)
customer_reviews.author: sylvan

customer_reviews.title: VERY SHARP BLADES
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend cleaning with a brush, keep your fingers away from the blades, VERY SHARP. Does a quick job of tenderizing meat, does improve texture. Spices, marinated, seasoning & sauces penetrate the meat more thoroughly
customer_reviews.author: SJaske

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean. Wasted my money.
customer_reviews.text: This did NOT work! Finally used it for the first time today and I regret I didn’t try it sooner! Now the return period is over and I’m throwing this away! It was so hard to press down, and it didn’t poke any HOLES in my meat. Useless. So hard to clean too. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny L.

customer_reviews.title: Best meat tenderizer by far
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome meat tenderizer. Simple to use and to clean Best one i ever had. Order as gift for friends. They were do impressed with how easy mine is to use
customer_reviews.author: Pat H

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tenderizer
customer_reviews.text: Adds a nice touch to tenderize meats. Not as easy to clean as my larger one, but that’s a small problem.
customer_reviews.author: DRS

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't Happy!! I Think part of the problem is ...
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described but it arrived almost a week late. I wasn't Happy!! I Think part of the problem is UPS Sure Post!!!
customer_reviews.author: LES

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever!!! I have bad TMJ disorder, so chewing steak can be difficult. Typically, we have used a mallet-style tenderizer, which helps some, but is still difficult for me to chew. My husband used this to go over his steak once, then went over my steak a few times. I ate my whole steak this weekend!!! So wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Carie P

customer_reviews.title: Marinade well absorbed!
customer_reviews.text: It’s well made with needles rigid and sharp. Together with its weight makes it easy to marinate my crispy pork belly! Well absorbed marinade indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Ayro

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Two blades fell out within 6 months and the whole thing fell apart within 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: LEANN POTTS

customer_reviews.title: mayb try another product
customer_reviews.text: its ok ..it get stuck when u poke the meat.....but it come out tender which is good
customer_reviews.author: Francis Aiwohi

customer_reviews.title: Really does work
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the metal hammer. Easy to tenderize chicken and keep it together for chicken cutlets or picatta. I have also used it to tenderize the thin sandwich steaks.
customer_reviews.author: cedarwillow

customer_reviews.title: Seriously sharp blades....
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesomely sharp. It works great for tenderizing roasts and steaks. It also worked great tenderizing the tip of my index finger the first time I tried it out. I'm obviously too clutzy to use this, so the duty has been assigned to my less-clutzy husband.
customer_reviews.author: Nichols71

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with tenderizing pork chops. It works great just like buying them already tenderized
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for every kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Lovely tenderizer. Bout one for myself and one for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this tenderizer works so we’ll especially great on steak
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Gliem

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product the one suggestion I would have is to ...
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful these needles are very very sharp. Excellent product the one suggestion I would have is to make the cap lock unlock more prominent.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Starnes

customer_reviews.title: Springs are a little stiff to easily press the sharp points into the meat
customer_reviews.text: Springs are a little stiff to easily press the sharp points into the meat. Otherwise it seems as ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: It works! What else can you say. It ...
customer_reviews.text: It works! What else can you say. It makes lots of little holes in the meat. Guess what you shouldn't do with it: yep, poke it into a potato. Cuz it doesn't want to release. I learned that the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: CRL

customer_reviews.title: Great tenderizer!
customer_reviews.text: The best meat tenderizer out there! My whole extended family owns this. I still can't believe what a difference it makes on the tenderness of the meat. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany17

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size for me to handle.
customer_reviews.text: Used to tenderize chicken breast and beef. I made an excellent choice. I also ordered two more for a couple of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: SAW-TIS

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT and tenderizes our steaks perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as shown and received promptly. Works GREAT and tenderizes our steaks perfectly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cslann

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect. Fits in my hand and all the needles ...
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect. Fits in my hand and all the needles really tenderize the meat to perfection with little effort. It arrived on time and is exactly what was advertised. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Great meat tenderizer. Very sharp, be extremely careful using and washing it!
customer_reviews.author: R&C F

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be good quality
customer_reviews.text: Only used it a few times but works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Good & Effective Tenderizer
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It really tenderizes the meat and infuses the flavor
customer_reviews.author: Innovation

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks. not hard to clean if you ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks. not hard to clean if you hold the black plunger down and use a typical kitchen brush with long handle.
customer_reviews.author: IMGBurn

customer_reviews.title: HUGE DIFFERENCE IN MEAT FLAVOR! EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I've used it on every kind of meat in the last week- each time, it is so tender, juicy and has better flavor. My wife can't believe my cooking could get any better! I skipped using it on some high grade steak I grilled last night- the difference was obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little gadget!
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget works great for making your own cube steak or pork for schnitzel.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Blades very sharp (no penetration issues). Easy to clean. Easy to use. Extremely quick. Spring is solid/strong. Lock is good.
customer_reviews.text: Blades very sharp (no penetration issues). Easy to clean. Easy to use. Extremely quick. Spring is solid/strong. Lock is good.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Fahle

customer_reviews.title: a great steak tenderizer
customer_reviews.text: it really works.....and will tenderize a steak up to an inch thick...and easily cleaned in the dishwasher. Be careful the small cutters are very sharp
customer_reviews.author: Williefan

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: You feel silly using it but it really works, especially with marinades. It made a 1.5" thick London broil steak very tender.
customer_reviews.author: temp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Noticeable change, I'm a meat lover and made steak very tender
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect for tenderizing all types of meat. Eady to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Ketchpaw

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Recieved in time, item works as intended. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro Macchiavello

customer_reviews.title: The needles are sharp
customer_reviews.text: Just received it. The needle are really sharp so have to be very caution. The only set back is the lock and unlock switch both are in black and really hard to twist. Also a little hard to push down to get the needle out. I will need to try it on the meat to see if it really work good for tenderizing.
customer_reviews.author: David Tang

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to push down
customer_reviews.text: This appliance is too hard to push down to make it work, I have to use all my body weight . And I work out! Shouldn't be this hard.
customer_reviews.author: az_az
